name: RATOMON (itch)
description:
RATOMON is a medieval top-down adventure to stop the Plague. Investigate random generated dungeons, eliminate rat hordes responsible for the disease.

The continent is suffering from the Plague. Every second the disease spreads, and the rat population grows. No time to waste!

Each dungeon is procedurally generated and have a lot of enemies willing to end your quest prematurely. Fighting them takes skill and proper use of available weapons and equipment.


Default controls are:

WASD or cursor keys for movement,

Left mouse button - shoot crossbow,

Right mouse button - throw grenade,

E - interact with game objects and NPC,

Space - dash,

M - show dungeon map,

P - pause.

NB! You can use WASD, cursor keys, E, Space and Enter for UI navigation.

NB! Keyboard keys can be redefined with some limitations.

NB! The game should work well with most gamepads, but please check yours in the demo before buying full game.
